subject: [Ip-health] WHA A60/64: Resolution on Public health, innovation and intellectual property
body:
The resolution on "Public health, innovation and intellectual property"
adopted at the 60th World Health Assembly can be found on the WHO
website in the report of Committee B.

The hard copy of the resolution was distributed in today's WHO
Executive Board meeting and the official reference number is "WHA60.30"
and the date of its adoption is 23 May 2007.

http://www.who.int/gb/ebwha/pdf_files/WHA60/A60_64-en.pdf
